TextView.android:text: This app was created and developed by Leandro Rocha and Bernardo Fonseca. The general idea is to help those with a garden, small or big, to manage them and maybe in the future to automate it. First the user has to login by using an existing account or create a new one, then he will be taken to the main menu where the "Manage Garden" button is. Once you enter the core part of our app the user can choose between a variety of plant options and assign them to a certain slot, these slots represent a spot in the users current garden, and can then set an appointed hour for irrigation of said plant. This way the user can have a better understanding of the composition of its own garden and know when and how to take care of them. In the future more updates can be added to help improve the user experience.
